item.description:
Dear Friends: Welcome www.BestMatchClub.com members.

Member request! Everyone welcome.

Dynamic, fun Super Bowl party begins at 6:00

Please invite a gentleman. Associate with other enthusiastic Patriot fans who enjoy being with other positive dynamic singles.

You have just found a potential companion with a common interest. Sports!These are people who want to just have fun, laugh and enjoy the excitement of a superbowl game. Singles with passion are welcome to share their joy of the sport.

Entry fee for this party is $25.00 and includes pizza and beer on me. You want wine? Then bring a quality bottle of wine for yourself and share it with others.

Notice the quality of people who attended the last party. I'm very happy. You will notice another higher level of quality will be achieved at this party.

Surprise! You will observe, Continuous improvement is a process. More improvements to come. This party is for single individuals.(30-65) The mission is to have fun and meet other high integrity single people with common interests.

Develop friendships and possibly find a lifetime partner.

Values: Be positive, nice, kind, cheerful, friendly and respectful to everyone.

Please invite other eligible single people. The synergistic efforts of everyone will make it truly a memorable party.

 ***The entry fee is $25.00 Organizer/Host - Richard and Nancy.

Location is in a warm, loving, supportive and relaxing environment of our home. "Dress code - " Comfortable".  First impressions are most meaningful.

6:00PM - 10:00pm Sunday. Feb. 6th, 2011 Maximum attendees 60 Location and Directions My Home 36 Woodridge Road Westwood, MA

781-551-3307

128-Exit 16B/Route 109 toward Westwood Go 2 miles left on Pond Street- just past the middle school on left-if you go by Dunkin Donuts on right you missed it. Go I mile left on Oak St. (google search says go right-this is wrong) Go 1.5 miles to end-right on Brook St. 100 feet take a right on Woodridge Road My home is the 3rd house on the left-cream colored- number 36 Woodridge, Westwood, MA See you on Sunday, Feb. 6th at 6:00pm----

Sharp TV coverage begins at 6:00pm If you are not a member please join at www.BestMatchClub.com The best is right now!

Richard Tosti PS: Speed dating it coming soon- offering privacy and a touch of class!
item.how_to_find_us: Welcome you at the door with a Sincere, Friendly Smile!
item.name: Super Bowl Sunday Home Party
